snippet: A gynecologist and her patient form a horrifyingly twisted connection in this batty, bloody Argentine melodrama.
keywords: subject : Movies;creative_works : The Attachment Diaries (Movie);persons : Diment, Valentin Javier;
headline.main: ‘The Attachment Diaries’ Review: Love, Sick
title: The Attachment Diaries
overview: Argentina, 1970s. A desperate young woman goes to a clinic to have a clandestine abortion. As her pregnancy is already through the fourth month, the doctor refuses. Instead, she proposes to sell the baby to one of her clients and offers to provide shelter in her house until the child is born. Their disturbed personalities will become intertwined in a strange and dangerous relationship.

snippet: A film adaptation of Taylor Jenkins Reid’s novel has potential for drama, but it stumbles on stock melodrama.
keywords: subject : Movies;persons : Bracey, Luke (1989- );persons : Liu, Simu;persons : Reid, Taylor Jenkins;persons : Soo, Phillipa;persons : Fickman, Andy;creative_works : One True Loves (Movie);
headline.main: ‘One True Loves’ Review: A Romance Lost at Sea
title: One True Loves
overview: Emma and Jesse are living the perfect life together, until Jesse disappears in a tragic helicopter crash on their first wedding anniversary. Four years later, Emma has found happiness again and is about to marry her best friend when Jesse resurfaces, turning her world upside down and leaving her torn between two great loves.

snippet: There’s not much Lennon music heard in this doc about his affair with May Pang, and given how much Pang trashes his wife, Yoko Ono, it’s no surprise it was withheld.
keywords: subject : Documentary Films and Programs;creative_works : The Lost Weekend: A Love Story (Movie);persons : Pang, May;persons : Lennon, John;persons : Ono, Yoko;persons : Brandstein, Eve;persons : Kaufman, Richard S (Filmmaker);persons : Samuels, Stuart (Filmmaker);subject : Content Type: Personal Profile;subject : Pop and Rock Music;
headline.main: ‘The Lost Weekend: A Love Story’ Review: When John Lennon Strayed
headline.print_headline: The Lost Weekend:  A Love Story
title: The Lost Weekend: A Love Story
original_title: The Lost Weekend: A Love Story
overview: May Pang lovingly recounts her life in rock & roll and the whirlwind 18 months spent as friend, lover, and confidante to one of the towering figures of popular culture, John Lennon, in this funny, touching, and vibrant portrait of first love.

snippet: This humdrum Netflix romantic comedy features Reese Witherspoon and Ashton Kutcher as longtime friends with possibly hidden feelings for each other.
keywords: subject : Movies;creative_works : Your Place or Mine (Movie);persons : Witherspoon, Reese;persons : Kutcher, Ashton;persons : McKenna, Aline Brosh;
headline.main: ‘Your Place or Mine’ Review: Try Neither
headline.print_headline: They Have a Humdrum Kind of Love
title: Your Place or Mine
overview: When best friends and total opposites Debbie and Peter swap homes for a week, they get a peek into each other's lives that could open the door to love.

snippet: To combat the overdose crisis, a group that includes former and current users open a safe consumption site where shooting up does not have to mean death.
keywords: subject : Documentary Films and Programs;subject : Fentanyl;subject : Drug Abuse and Traffic;subject : Volunteers and Community Service;creative_works : Love in the Time of Fentanyl (Movie);persons : Askey, Colin;glocations : Vancouver (British Columbia);organizations : Overdose Prevention Society;
headline.main: ‘Love in the Time of Fentanyl’ Review: Heartbreak, Death and Hope in Vancouver
headline.print_headline: Love in the Time Of Fentanyl
title: Love in the Time of Fentanyl
original_title: Love in the Time of Fentanyl
overview: An intimate portrait of a community fighting to save lives and keep hope alive in a neighborhood ravaged by the overdose crisis.

snippet: In this naturalistic drama from Spain, a family confronts the impending loss of its generations-old farm.
keywords: subject : Movies;persons : Simon, Carla;creative_works : Alcarras (Movie);
headline.main: ‘Alcarràs’ Review: Labor of Love
title: Alcarràs
overview: In a small village in Catalonia, the peach farmers of the Solé family spend every summer together picking fruit from their orchard. But when plans arise to install solar panels and cut down trees, the members of this tight-knit group suddenly face eviction – and the loss of far more than their home.

snippet: A young singer gets more than she bargained for when she accepts a job as a nanny for a billionaire’s children.
keywords: subject : Movies;persons : Ne-Yo;creative_works : The Sound of Christmas (Movie);persons : Mattison, Booker T;persons : McNeill, Serayah;
headline.main: ‘The Sound of Christmas’ Review: A Gospel Singer Finds Love
title: The Sound of Christmas
overview: A woman facing eviction just before Christmas who must navigate budding romantic feelings for a handsome billionaire when she takes a job nannying for his two children right before Christmas.

snippet: Luca Guadagnino’s latest stars Timothée Chalamet and Taylor Russell as young cannibals on the run.
keywords: subject : Movies;creative_works : Bones and All (Movie);persons : Guadagnino, Luca;persons : Chalamet, Timothee (1995- );persons : Russell, Taylor (1994- );
headline.main: ‘Bones and All’ Review: You Eat What You Are
headline.print_headline: It’s Eat, Prey, Love on a Journey of Self-Discovery
title: Bones and All
overview: Abandoned by her father, a young woman embarks on a thousand-mile odyssey through the backroads of America where she meets a disenfranchised drifter. But despite their best efforts, all roads lead back to their terrifying pasts and to a final stand that will determine whether their love can survive their otherness.

snippet: A schoolteacher, her police officer husband and his lover deny each other romantic satisfaction in this dismal melodrama.
keywords: subject : Movies;creative_works : My Policeman (Movie);persons : Grandage, Michael;
headline.main: ‘My Policeman’ Review: Two Love Affairs, Equally Tragic
title: My Policeman
overview: In the late 1990s, the arrival of elderly invalid Patrick into Marion and Tom’s home triggers the exploration of seismic events from 40 years previous: the passionate relationship between Tom and Patrick at a time when homosexuality was illegal.

snippet: This comedy is a daddy-issues movie with a queasy premise truly made for these times.
keywords: subject : Movies;persons : Oswalt, Patton;creative_works : I Love My Dad (Movie);persons : Morosini, James;
headline.main: ‘I Love My Dad’ Review: A Father Catfishes His Son
headline.print_headline: A Father Catfishes His Son. We Just Wait for the Ick.
title: I Love My Dad
overview: A hopelessly estranged father catfishes his son in an attempt to reconnect.

snippet: Katie Holmes writes, directs and stars in this minor-key rom-com set in 2020.
keywords: subject : Movies;persons : Holmes, Katie;creative_works : Alone Together (Movie);
headline.main: ‘Alone Together’ Review: Finding Love in a Pandemic Retreat
title: Alone Together
overview: Strangers June and Charlie wind up double-booked in the same upstate New York Airbnb during the start of COVID-19. Exasperating the situation, the lockdown forces them both to stay and confront the unexpected feelings that develop between them.

snippet: A disillusioned college professor develops a relationship with a young Chinese woman, in a familiar and worn-out narrative.
keywords: subject : Movies;creative_works : Art of Love (Movie);persons : Kaplan, Betty (Film Director);
headline.main: ‘Art of Love’ Review: An Erotic Male Fantasy in Puerto Rico
title: Art of Love
overview: After learning that the art thief she has been chasing is her ex-lover, an officer working for Interpol concocts a plan to catch him red-handed.

snippet: In the latest film from Claire Denis, Juliette Binoche plays a Parisian radio journalist in a romantic quandary.
keywords: subject : Movies;persons : Denis, Claire;persons : Binoche, Juliette;persons : Lindon, Vincent;creative_works : Both Sides of the Blade (Movie);
headline.main: ‘Both Sides of the Blade’ Review: Who Do You Love?
headline.print_headline: A Bliss Doomed To Be Doused
title: Both Sides of the Blade
overview: Jean and Sara have been living together for 10 years. When they first met, Sara was living with François, Jean’s best friend and an admirer from back when he played rugby. Jean and Sara love each other. One day, Sara sees François in the street. He does not notice her, but she is overtaken by the sensation that her life could suddenly change. François gets back in touch with Jean. For the first time in years. He suggests they start working together again. From here on, things spiral out of control.

snippet: Sara Dosa’s new documentary chronicles the lives and deaths of the French scientists Katia and Maurice Krafft.
keywords: subject : Documentary Films and Programs;subject : Volcanoes;creative_works : Fire of Love (Movie);subject : Content Type: Personal Profile;subject : Deaths (Fatalities);persons : Dosa, Sara;persons : Krafft, Maurice (1946-91);persons : Krafft, Katia (1942-91);
headline.main: ‘Fire of Love’ Review: A Volcanic Romance
title: Fire of Love
overview: A doomed love triangle between intrepid French scientists Katia and Maurice Krafft, and their beloved volcanoes.

snippet: A new documentary about the gospel ensemble the Branchettes and its guiding light, Lena Mae Perry, is a plain-spoken tribute.
keywords: subject : Documentary Films and Programs;subject : Gospel Music;creative_works : Stay Prayed Up (Movie);subject : Content Type: Personal Profile;persons : Perry, Lena Mae;organizations : Branchettes (Music Group);persons : Anderson, DL (Filmmaker);persons : Durning, Matthew;
headline.main: ‘Stay Prayed Up’ Review: Spreading the Gospel of Love
title: Stay Prayed Up
overview: Lena Mae “Mother” Perry, the backbone of her community, cooks for crowds, tends to the needy, and boy, can she sing! After 50 years leading the dynamic, down-home gospel group The Branchettes, the octogenarian powerhouse, armed with her unwavering faith, shows no signs of slowing down. Taking us inside her loving community while following the recording of the group’s first album, this film is bursting with warmth, joy, and soul-stirring gospel music.

snippet: This drama from Ximan Li teases time in telling the stories of three Chinese women living in a city that tempts promise but delivers frustration.
keywords: subject : Movies;creative_works : In A New York Minute (Movie);persons : Ximan Li;
headline.main: ‘In a New York Minute’ Review: Love or Freedom?
title: In a New York Minute
overview: In A New York Minute follows three Asian women, each at a different stage in their life as they deal with their own personal struggles. Amy is haunted by a past breakup that has manifested into an eating disorder. Angel is caught between a loveless marriage with an older American businessman and a passionate affair with Chinese filmmaker. Nina moonlights as an escort as a way of supporting herself financially. As the story unfolds, the film reveals each character’s wants and desires is reflected in the other.

snippet: A restless woman discovers herself in a seductive French romance that throws out the usual dusty script about women, desire and pleasure.
keywords: subject : Movies;persons : Bourgeois-Tacquet, Charline;creative_works : Anais in Love (Movie);
headline.main: ‘Anaïs in Love’ Review: Portrait of a Woman on the Run
title: Anaïs in Love
overview: A young woman struggling to stay on top of everything in her life meets a married publisher and begins an affair with him.

snippet: When a perennially single journalist travels across the country to meet her dream guy, she finds she’s been catfished.
keywords: subject : Movies;creative_works : Love Hard (Movie);persons : Jimenez, Hernan;
headline.main: ‘Love Hard’ Review: Seeking Connection, Not Perfection
title: Love Hard
overview: An LA girl, unlucky in love, falls for an East Coast guy on a dating app and decides to surprise him for Christmas, only to discover that she's been catfished. But the object of her affection actually lives in the same town, and the guy who duped her offers to set them up if she pretends to be his own girlfriend for the holidays.

snippet: Jason Sudeikis plays a paroled felon who vows to give his dying lover the best year of her life.
keywords: subject : Movies;persons : Sudeikis, Jason;persons : Lilly, Evangeline (1979- );persons : Keshales, Aharon;creative_works : South of Heaven (Movie);
headline.main: ‘South of Heaven’ Review: Anything for Love
title: South of Heaven
overview: Convicted felon Jimmy gets early parole after serving twelve years for armed robbery. Upon his release, he vows to give Annie, his childhood love, now dying from cancer, the best last year of her life – unfortunately it’s not that simple.

snippet: In this latest work by Kiyoshi Kurosawa, a Japanese couple’s relationship is shaped by the forces of churning nationalism that surround it.
keywords: subject : Movies;persons : Kurosawa, Kiyoshi;creative_works : Wife of a Spy (Movie);
headline.main: ‘Wife of a Spy’ Review: Trust or Fear in Love and War?
title: Wife of a Spy
overview: It’s 1940, and the population of Japan is divided over its entry into World War II. Satoko, the wife of a fabric merchant, is devoted to her husband but is beginning to suspect he’s up to something. Soon she allows herself to be drawn into a game in which she enigmatically conceals her intentions.

snippet: In the Disney+ concert film “Happier Than Ever: A Love Letter to Los Angeles,” the pop star Billie Eilish pays tribute to the star-struck hauntedness of that city.
keywords: subject : Documentary Films and Programs;subject : Music;persons : Eilish, Billie;persons : Rodriguez, Robert;creative_works : Happier Than Ever: A Love Letter to Los Angeles (Movie);persons : Osborne, Patrick (Film Director);glocations : Los Angeles (Calif);
headline.main: ‘Happier Than Ever’ Review: Modern Pop Meets Classic Hollywood
headline.print_headline: Happier Than Ever:  A Love Letter  to Los Angeles
title: Happier Than Ever
overview: During the military dictatorship, a political militant takes his son out of the boarding school, and puts him temporarily in a friend's luxury and empty apartment in Copacabana beach. The son knows very little about his father, and the latter cannot really explain his activities to his son, fearing for his security. So the young man stands alone in the huge apartment, waiting for the infrequent meetings with his father, without really knowing what's going on.

snippet: Sharon Horgan and James McAvoy play a battling couple trapped in lockdown in this theatrical pandemic drama.
keywords: subject : Movies;creative_works : Together (Movie);persons : Daldry, Stephen;persons : McAvoy, James;persons : Horgan, Sharon (1970- );
headline.main: ‘Together’ Review: Love and Loathing in London
headline.print_headline: Love and Loathing in a Blighted London
title: Together
overview: A husband and wife are forced to re-evaluate themselves and their relationship through the reality of the Covid-19 lockdown.

snippet: Adam Driver and Marion Cotillard are star-crossed lovers in this hallucinatory musical, written by Sparks and directed by Leos Carax.
keywords: subject : Movies;persons : Carax, Leos;persons : Cotillard, Marion;persons : Driver, Adam;persons : Mael, Ron;persons : Mael, Russell;creative_works : Annette (Movie);organizations : Sparks (Music Group);
headline.main: ‘Annette’ Review: Love Hurts
headline.print_headline: A Star Is Born. You Won’t Like Him.
title: Annette
overview: The story of Henry, a stand-up comedian with a fierce sense of humour and Ann, a singer of international renown. In the spotlight, they are the perfect couple, healthy, happy, and glamourous. The birth of their first child, Annette, a mysterious girl with an exceptional destiny, will change their lives.

snippet: Benoît Jacquot’s erotic costume drama envisions the Italian playboy as a weathered sad sack living in exile.
keywords: subject : Movies;persons : Jacquot, Benoit;creative_works : Casanova, Last Love (Movie);
headline.main: ‘Casanova, Last Love’ Review: Reappraising a Philanderer
title: Casanova, Last Love
overview: Year 1763. Forced into exile, the famous libertine Giacomo Casanova leaves Paris and travels to London, where he meets Marianne de Charpillon, a young prostitute to whom he is so attracted that he forgets about the other women.

snippet: This small-town comedy from New Zealand looks at the romance between a country girl and a man accused of killing his family.
keywords: subject : Movies;creative_works : This Town (Movie);persons : White, David (Director);
headline.main: ‘This Town’ Review: Love and Rifles
title: This Town
overview: Five years after being acquitted for the murder of his family, Sean (White) is finally ready to move on with life. But the bitter ex-cop (Malcolm) who led the investigation remains adamant that he's guilty - and will stop at nothing to bring him down.

snippet: Fiery physical contact keeps an expat couple together in Greece, and the sex scenes are enough for a half-dozen movies.
keywords: subject : Movies;persons : Papadimitropoulos, Argyris;persons : Stan, Sebastian;persons : Gough, Denise (1980- );creative_works : Monday (Movie);
headline.main: ‘Monday’ Review: A Year of Love and Its Hangovers
title: Monday
overview: A spark on a Friday can lead to a sizzling weekend fling, but what happens when you get to the inevitable Monday?

snippet: In this keeps-you-guessing comedy, Joel McHale and Kerry Bishé play a couple married for 14 years whose mutual passion is undimmed, to the annoyance of their friends.
keywords: subject : Movies;creative_works : Happily (Movie);persons : Grabinski, BenDavid;
headline.main: ‘Happily’ Review: Does Long-Lived Love Mean You Need Treatment?
title: Happily
overview: Tom and Janet have been happily married for years. But a visit from a mysterious stranger leads to a dead body, a lot of questions, and a tense couples' trip with friends who may not actually be friends at all.

snippet: Ava DuVernay’s 2008 documentary, now streaming on Netflix, is a personal love letter to a slice of Los Angeles’s 1990s hip-hop scene.
keywords: subject : Documentary Films and Programs;subject : Rap and Hip-Hop;persons : DuVernay, Ava;subject : Black People;subject : Blacks;glocations : California;glocations : Los Angeles (Calif);creative_works : This Is the Life (Movie);
headline.main: ‘This Is the Life’ Review: A Valuable Part of Hip-Hop History
headline.print_headline: A Love Letter to 1990s California Hip-Hop
title: This Is the Life
overview: In 1989, a collective of young hip hop artists gathered at a health food café in South Central Los Angeles. Their mandate? To reject gang culture and expand the musical boundaries of hip hop. DuVernay's documentary chronicles the historic legacy of the Good Life Cafe — the open mic nights that became an L.A. institution, the eclectic array of talented young MCs that emerged there, the alternative hip hop movement they developed, and their worldwide influence on the artform.

snippet: An older lesbian couple is met with unexpected devastation in this aching romantic drama by Filippo Meneghetti.
keywords: subject : Movies;persons : Sukowa, Barbara;creative_works : Two of Us (Movie);persons : Meneghetti, Filippo;
headline.main: ‘Two of Us’ Review: Thwarted Love
title: Two of Us
overview: Nina and Madeleine have been sharing their lives and the landing between their two apartments for decades. After more than 20 years of loving in the shadows, Madeleine promises Nina she will tell her family the truth. It takes an unexpected event to show her the importance of living your truth.

snippet: Ukraine’s official Oscar entry, the movie depicts an all-too-convincing dystopia, with no fancy gadgets or cars.
keywords: subject : Movies;creative_works : Atlantis (Movie);persons : Vasyanovych, Valentyn;
headline.main: ‘Atlantis’ Review: A Bleak Apocalypse Love Story
title: Atlantis
overview: Atmospheric soundtrack follows this compilation of nature footage that focuses on the ocean and various life forms that live, mate and die in it.

snippet: This documentary looks at how a contemporary art museum in Western Massachusetts transformed a struggling small town.
keywords: subject : Documentary Films and Programs;subject : Art;creative_works : Museum Town (Movie);persons : Trainer, Jennifer;organizations : Massachusetts Museum of Contemporary Art;subject : Museums;glocations : North Adams (Mass);
headline.main: ‘Museum Town’ Review: A Love Letter to Mass MoCA
title: Museum Town
overview: A rural American town suffering economically from factory closures finds an unconventional route to recovery with the help of MASS MoCA.

snippet: This Errol Morris documentary explores the relationship between the LSD guru and Joanna Harcourt-Smith, a woman who likened herself to Mata Hari.
keywords: subject : Documentary Films and Programs;creative_works : My Psychedelic Love Story (Movie);persons : Harcourt-Smith, Joanna (1946-2020);persons : Morris, Errol;subject : LSD (Lysergic Acid Diethylamide);subject : Content Type: Personal Profile;
headline.main: ‘My Psychedelic Love Story’ Review: On the Run With Timothy Leary
headline.print_headline: Acid and Romance: On the Run With Timothy Leary
title: My Psychedelic Love Story
overview: An examination of the notorious high priest of LSD Timothy Leary through the eyes of his famed lover Joanna Harcourt-Smith.

snippet: The rise and fall of the provocative rapper Tekashi69 is chronicled in this Hulu documentary.
keywords: subject : Documentary Films and Programs;subject : Rap and Hip-Hop;persons : Gandhi, Vikram;persons : 6ix9ine (Rapper);creative_works : 69: The Saga of Danny Hernandez (Movie);
headline.main: ‘69: The Saga of Danny Hernandez’ Review: A SoundCloud-Rap Rat
headline.print_headline: Loved in Hip-Hop, but Loathed in the End
title: 69: The Saga of Danny Hernandez
overview: Part investigative documentary, part real-life gangster movie, this film unpacks the life of polarizing rap sensation and internet troll Tekashi69, aka 69, while chronicling his meteoric rise and fall from fame.

snippet: Kate Winslet’s fossil hunter and Saoirse Ronan’s convalescent embark on a forbidden seaside romance.
keywords: subject : Movies;persons : Ronan, Saoirse;persons : Winslet, Kate;persons : Lee, Francis (1969- );creative_works : Ammonite (Movie);
headline.main: ‘Ammonite’ Review: Love on the Rocks
title: Ammonite
overview: In 1840s England, palaeontologist Mary Anning and a young woman sent by her husband to convalesce by the sea develop an intense relationship. Despite the chasm between their social spheres and personalities, Mary and Charlotte discover they can each offer what the other has been searching for: the realisation that they are not alone. It is the beginning of a passionate and all-consuming love affair that will defy all social bounds and alter the course of both lives irrevocably.

snippet: The new sci-fi adventure from Michael Matthews lacks the self-seriousness of typical dystopian flicks but doesn’t completely lack depth.
keywords: persons : Matthews, Michael (Film Director);subject : Movies;creative_works : Love and Monsters (Movie);
headline.main: ‘Love and Monsters’ Review: Coming-of-Age After the Apocalypse
title: Love and Monsters
overview: Seven years since the Monsterpocalypse began, Joel Dawson has been living underground in order to survive. But after reconnecting over radio with his high school girlfriend Aimee, Joel decides to venture out to reunite with her, despite all the dangerous monsters that stand in his way.

snippet: With the help of her father, the documentary filmmaker Kirsten Johnson made a surprising, endearing movie about his death.
keywords: creative_works : Dick Johnson Is Dead (Movie);subject : Documentary Films and Programs;persons : Johnson, Kirsten (1965- );creative_works : Cameraperson (Movie);subject : Death and Dying;
headline.main: ‘Dick Johnson Is Dead’ Review: A Father’s Painful, Funny Goodbye
headline.print_headline: A Love Letter Delivered Along With a Death Notice
title: Dick Johnson Is Dead
overview: With this inventive portrait, director Kirsten Johnson seeks a way to keep her 86-year-old father alive forever. Utilizing moviemaking magic and her family’s dark humor, she celebrates Dr. Dick Johnson’s last years by staging fantasies of death and beyond. Together, dad and daughter confront the great inevitability awaiting us all.

snippet: This superficial take on the writing and initial staging of “Cyrano de Bergerac” is a whirlwind of soapy declarations and backstage chaos.
keywords: subject : Movies;creative_works : Cyrano, My Love (Movie);persons : Michalik, Alexis;
headline.main: ‘Cyrano, My Love’ Review: A Nose for Romance
title: Cyrano, My Love
overview: Paris, France, December 1897. The young playwright Edmond Rostand feels like a failure. Inspiration has abandoned him. Married and father of two children, desperate and penniless, he persuades the great actor Constant Coquelin to perform the main role in his new play. But there is a problem: Coquelin wants to premiere it at Christmas and Edmond has not written a single word.

snippet: The Japanese director Ryusuke Hamaguchi follows up his marathon “Happy Hour” with a story of love among young urbanites.
keywords: subject : Movies;creative_works : Asako I & II (Movie);persons : Hamaguchi, Ryusuke;
headline.main: ‘Asako I & II’ Review: Double the Love (and the Heartbreak)
headline.print_headline: Falling For a Drifter And His Lookalike
title: Asako I & II
overview: College student Asako falls in love at first sight with Baku after meeting at a photography exhibit. Romance sparks between the two but doesn't last long when Baku suddenly disappears from her life. Two years later, she spots a man that bears a striking resemblance to him. Even though it is only his physical similarities to Baku that attracted her to him, she doesn't say so and starts dating the soft-spoken young man called Ryohei.

snippet: A ruthless empiricist searching for life beyond Earth learns a thing or two about life on the planet.
keywords: subject : Movies;creative_works : Clara (Movie);persons : Adams, Patrick J;persons : Esmer, Ennis (1978- );persons : Sherman, Akash;
headline.main: ‘Clara’ Review: Love Means Never Having to Say You’re Starry
title: Clara
overview: An astronomer becomes obsessed with searching the cosmos for signs of life beyond Earth which leads to a shocking discovery.
